title: The 11 Best Casino Courses
headline: The 11 Best Casino Courses
description: With the PGA Tour headed back to Las Vegas this week, we celebrate the nation’s best courses tied to gaming facilities. While there’s no such thing as a “sure thing,” the following 11 casino courses -- like Shadow Creek in Las Vegas -- are the best bets around.
